s.text: She just jumps into the shower and puts her wet hair back into a ponytail, which emphasizes her deceptively childlike appearance, and makes me feel slightly Humbertish at check-in time.
She just jumps into the shower and puts her wet hair back into a ponytail, which emphasizes her deceptively childlike appearance, and makes me feel slightly Humbertish at check-in time.
To the contrary--it's precisely because she is likable that her husband's handlers will stick her in our faces until we can't stand the sight of her.

To be fair, E has (until last night) required less maintenance than expected.

To the contrary--it's precisely because she is likable that her husband's handlers will stick her in our faces until we can't stand the sight of her.

The doctor explained this was not uncommon (apparently the detergent used by some motels can cause an allergic reaction) and sent her home with three different prescriptions, which returned her skin to its previous lustrous condition but rendered her semi-comatose.
